House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08425
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING AN INTERNAL AFFAIRS SERVICE IN THE BUREAU OF IMMIGRATION AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
ABSTRACT : Seeks to maintain, promote, and ensure the Bureau of Immigration's high standard of ethics in public service through the establishment of an Internal Affairs Service. It shall serve as a monitoring, investigatory, recommendatory and disciplinary body whose primary objective is to ensure that the Bureau is instilling and strengthening responsibility and accountability among its personnel.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VERGARA, ROSANNA "RIA" V.
DATE FILED : 2018-10-09
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
